short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a board game name, quickly open its BGG page via the browser context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions adds a "See on BoardGameGeek" shortcut in the context menu to help quickly get info on board games when browsing the web.

On any webpage, select a board game name with your mouse, right click it, click on "See on BoardGameGeek" and voil√†! A new tab opens with the game page on BGG.
